akad. Grad.description: The academic degree of the individual involved

Vorname.description: The first name of the individual involved

Nachname.description: The last name of the individual involved

Datum.description: The date in the format DD.MM.YYYY

Name des Studiengangs.description: The name of the study program

Kriterien.description: Criteria related to the establishment of the study program

Art.description: The type or category of the study program, represented as an integer

Art des Studiengangs.description: The specific type of the study program

Art des Abschlusses.description: The type of degree awarded upon completion

Institution.description: The institution offering the study program

Partnerinstitution.description: The partner institution involved in the study program

Partner Ort.description: The location of the partner institution

Partner Land.description: The country of the partner institution

Freigabe.description: Indicates whether the study program is approved or released. Options: Ja (Yes) or Nein (No)

Gewicht.description: Indicates whether weight is applicable. Options: Ja (Yes) or Nein (No)

Regel.description: The rule or regulation associated with the study program, represented as a numeric value
